title: I think its about time Jarvan became the King.
body:
Seriously Swain is now the leader of Noxus it is only fitting that his Rival becomes King of Demacia as well. Not only that but we could have a Noxus vs Demacia war event.

Also my 2 cents but i feel like Jarvan should have been a juggernaut as well because he just fits the profile.

replies.body:
OH I JUST CAN'T WAIT TO BE KING!

NO ONE SAYING SMITE THIS. NO ONE SAYING ULT THERE! 
NO ONE SAYING E Q! NO ONE SAYING WARD HERE!


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l8UFnc85-xM

...........................



{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

> NO ONE SAYING E Q! NO ONE SAYING WARD HERE!

> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l8UFnc85-xM

Someone edit Jarvans face into the song and it will be perfect!
This needs to be a full song o-o
Jarvan is the King of Demacia, Jarvan III to be exact, but he is.

> [{quoted}](name=Ebonmaw Dragon,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Oi3szMBW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-05T22:06:50.887+0000)
>
> Jarvan is the King of Demacia, Jarvan III to be exact, but he is.

I know thats why i made the note of Swain being Jarvans rival considering Jarvan the 3 has no real enemies that we know of .
Honestly I think they might want to keep him as a prince simply because he is the only viable prince-character in runeterra,so he is also riots only chance to have a prince in the game.

They could easily make Jarvan 4th a king and then give him a child.

Honestly Jarvan the 3rd was only mention in the JOJ once or twice and then never mentioned again. It would make it far better if J4 became the  king then he would be on Swains same level and we could have war events between the two.

Yeah,but the child would mean that they first have to pair up J4 with someone else and then the child would need to grow up to qualify as a champion(or do you mean they should simply retcon J4 into the king anyway?)

And don't get me wrong,I agree with you,that making J4 the leader of demacia would be cool to put him on the same level as swain.

> [{quoted}](name=GreenLore,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Oi3szMBW,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-01-06T07:35:59.500+0000)
>
> Yeah,but the child would mean that they first have to pair up J4 with someone else and then the child would need to grow up to qualify as a champion(or do you mean they should simply retcon J4 into the king anyway?)
> 
> And don't get me wrong,I agree with you,that making J4 the leader of demacia would be cool to put him on the same level as swain.

Shyvanna volunteers for the job with every fiber of her being.

> [{quoted}](name=Maximum Morde,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Oi3szMBW,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-06T14:42:35.671+0000)
>
> Shyvanna volunteers for the job with every fiber of her being.

**Shyvanna volunteers for the job with every fiber of her being**
{{champion:90}} skinz
skins are non-canon though
He actually doesn't fit as a Juggie at all, he's mobile and has no tank scaling. He's a diver that builds somewhat tanky to survive.
We need to know more about Damacia before J4 can be king.

We know as much about Noxus as we do Demacia. 

Which is to say not much other than Noxus Values power and Swain is crafty and has Darius at his side.

Demacia is a militaristic kingdom that favors honor and duty and is strict in keeping its people in line.
But, but... how about the theory that Le Blanc disguised herself as Jarvan? Oh, wait, retcon, the theory isn't plausible anymore :(

Juggernauts are immobile heavy fighters.
Jarvan is a fighter with a dash.

And {{champion:86}} has a ms buff, he must not be a juggernaut either :^)

I think a bit of mobility could be forgiven in any case. Just as long as you aren't {{champion:114}} or {{champion:92}}

Oh, I see, Garen is a mobile champion because of the ms buff on his Q.
You should probably contact Riot and tell them they got it all wrong and their definition of juggernaut is incorrect.
:^)

"What are you doing, my son?"
"Succeeding you, father"

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=99jXY7oCmz4

I KNOW IT' S GOING TO BE SOMETHING LIKE THIS
